ComicInfo.Title: Love and Rockets X - Part Nine; Poison River - Pt. Eleven; Wig Wam Bam 8
ComicInfo.Summary:
Love and Rockets X - Part Nine: Maricela turns violent and winds up in jail after Riri heads back to Palomar, but Guadalupe and Pipo Jimenez, newly arrived in town, spring her out. Mike and Igor go to Germany. Charlie searches for an excuse for why he killed Carl. E. T. takes a break with his kid to recuperate from his kidnapping. Kristen decides to go to school in Iraq where her mother is. Junior Brooks beats up a guy who was praising the deceased Carl. Rex wins an Oscar for his screenplay about his difficulties with the Love and Rockets band. Steve finally leaves Palomar.
Poison River - Pt. Eleven: Gorgo ties up loose ends with people in Peter and Luba's orbit, stating that he's going to California. Luba, Ofelia and Hilda go to Isleta, the latter two's hometown where they find their home destroyed. Luba continues her carousing and Ofelia deals with her serious back injury.
Wig Wam Bam 8: A large group of ladies dressed up as little girls are at Nan's place, hired by her to fulfill her fetish. Jenny's aggressiveness sets off Mrs. Watkins, who strikes her in the head with her cane, causing her to collapse and ultimately be hospitalized. Izzy visits Nacho and winds up reading from Maggie's diary, detailing how Maggie met her best friend Letty and how they first got into punk rock. Hopey goes back to Tex's place but then two thugs, sending a message from Nan, force their way in and physically assault the both of them, leaving Hopey bloodied and Tex hospitalized.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-31 10:12:38. [CVDB95766] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 21:57:42. [Issue ID 212425]
